CustomField.formula:
IF(CONTAINS(Owner.UserRole.Name, "SMB"),
IF(Last_Call__c > NOW() - 3 , IMAGE("/img/samples/light_green.gif", "Green"), IF(Last_Call__c > NOW() - 7 , IMAGE("/img/samples/light_yellow.gif", "Yellow"), IMAGE("/img/samples/light_red.gif", "Red"))),
IF(Last_Call__c > NOW() - 7 , IMAGE("/img/samples/light_green.gif", "Green"), IF(Last_Call__c > NOW() - 14 , IMAGE("/img/samples/light_yellow.gif", "Yellow"), IMAGE("/img/samples/light_red.gif", "Red")))
)
CustomField.label: Account Last Call Status
